[i]Origin[/i] – As Kris, Friend Above All enters, choose a color and creature type. Spells of the chosen color cost {1} less to cast and creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.
[i]Present[/i] – Whenever Kris attacks, choose a color and a creature type. He becomes the chosen color and creature type until end of turn. Creatures you control that share a color or that type with him get +2/+1 until end of turn.
[i]Future[/i] – When Kris leaves the battlefield, support 3. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to three other target creatures.)[/i]
